text: Brian Bell (born 1968) is an American guitarist for the band Weezer. Brian Bell may also refer to: * Brian Bell (American football) (born 1984), American football fullback * Brian Bell (businessman) (1928–2010), Australian-born businessman in Papua New Guinea * Brian Bell (ornithologist) (1930–2016), New Zealand ornithologist * Brian Murray (actor) (1937–2018), South African actor born Brian Bell ==See also== * Bryan Bell, Canadian politician
title: Brian Bell (disambiguation)
